Half-Life: Source es el mismo Half-Life 1 "Remasterizado" en el nuevo motor grafico creado por VALVe; Source. Es practicamente un "copy-paste" del Half-Life 1. Mismas armas, mismos enemigos, mismas texturas, todo exactamente igual que el HL1, exeptuando por algunas cosas. Por ejemplo los efectos de iluminacion y particulas.
Lo Bueno: es la misma experiencia que el HL1 en graficos mejorados c:
Lo Malo: bueno.... con la ultima actualizacion del motor grafico trajo consigo algunos bugs y errores en el juego, por ejemplo: las lenguas de los Barnacle o Lapa son "invisibles", algunos Cientificos quedan "flotando" en algunas sillas, y bueno [spoiler] si te quedas mirando los creditos al final gman te quedara mirando como pedofilo D: [/spoiler].

Hasta que Valve no lanze una actualizacion arreglando esos errores lamentablemente tendre que decir que no recomiendo el juego, aunque a veces me dan ganas de jugarlo no es lo que yo esperaba :c 6.9/10

Si nunca jugaste a Half Life, compra Black Mesa y espera a que lo acaben al 100% por que esto puede que se te quede grande (jugabilidad, gráficos, narración, etc...).

This is game is pretty good....it's a port of the original half life on to the source engine,many people say this game is too hard even on easy.OK,it kinda is,but if you have played other valve games this ones controlls will be familiar,when you play the game a lot of times you'll start to understand how the AI works,you know how every enemy in the game thinks,it's a lot of fun setting up traps where the enemies would teleport,the story is good,if you don't shoot everything in your way the story will be clear.

Also I have to talk about the graphics,the game is more shiny and the water is shadery as well.The environments look more "alive".
The only thing that everyone hates are ladders.THEY ARE THE WORST.

[i] Not as good as I remember. [/i]

I played this game as part of a replay of the whole Half-Life series, only to realise that most of the good bits I remembered were from Half-Life 2 and onwards. The game seems very dated by now, and can be very frustrating at times. In future I will probably just stick to the sequels, as the plots of each game are very seperate, so there's no need to play the original in order to understand the later games.

Nutshell: 6/10 - Get the original Half-Life if you want a bug-free experience, if you already got Half-Life 1 and want a remake, get Black Mesa, if you're a hardcore fan of Half-Life (or valve games in general) then it may be worth getting this game.

Pros: 
- Slightly Improved Graphics over Original - There are some HD textures here and there, looks a little better than original, however this is a remaster/source port, not a remake, if you want drastically better graphics, get "Black Mesa". 
- Decent Source Port of the original Half-Life. If you want a source port of Half-Life, go ahead.

Cons:
- Riddled with minor bugs - They are not game-breaking, and I haven't had the game crash yet, but when you run into bugs, they are very noticeable and will slightly ruin the experience, it might also cause FPS drops on lower-end laptops, for those budget gamers out there wondering how well this game will run.
- If you want to play Half-Life 1 and you use a weaker laptop (a lot of gamers do), get the original Half-Life which runs far better on lower-end computers. The graphics improvements of this port are hardly noticeable but it does drop FPS noticeably.
- Valve, why are you making ports of previous titles instead of making Half-Life 3?

In summary, if you are a hardcore collector of valve games and need this to complete the collection, then go ahead, don't expect anything amazing though.

Só falta um Half-Life 3 mesmo.

Was a bit skeptical to play Half-Life: Source since I'm not much into Sci-Fi games but after playing it, I got lost in how deep of an experience it really is. From the problem solving to the pinpoint FPS aspect, HL:S failed to disappoint. Highly recommend!

Half-Life Source, делает именно то что сказано в названии игры - переносит происходящее на движок (тогда новомодного) Source. При переносе, увы, забыли добавить новых более высококачественных моделей или анимации. 

Если вы собираетесь тратить деньги на это, лучше купите оригинал (так будет "тру" опыт), или возьмите ремейк фанатов "Black Mesa" который недавно вышел в полный релиз!

Half life. One of the original games that almost every PC gamer has heard of or played. 

Half life puts you in the shoes of a scientist from black mesa. Gordan Freeman. A experiment goes horribly wrong and causes a "Ressonance Cascade" (not sure if i spelled it right) which allows aliens from another world (dimension or universe) to come to earth. The complex goes wacky and communications are out. Troops from the surface are coming down to rescue, as the science team says, but they plan to kill everyone who was involved.

You must fight the troops and aliens, and make your way through their homeworld to defeat Nihilanth that controlls everything. Once Nihilanth has been defeated, all the vorticaunts and aliens are free. Gman then teleports you and gives you an offer. Work with him. Or be teleported to thousands of aliens and be slaughtered with the text that says. "You Died"
 You choose to work with him.

On to Half Life 2...

Pros:
A classic CLASSIC game that every PC gamer should play.
An amazing storyline that features some of the best moments in gaming history.
Made by Valve.

Cons:
You havent bought it yet.
Its a upgraded source code that's a little broken. Sometimes there are glitches but I havent come across any or crashes.

10/10
The. Best. Game. In. History

Since everyone is complaining about glitchtes, I'll just do a run down of entire game SPOILERS AHEAD.

[spoiler]Chapter 1: Black Mesa Inbound: In the original it's made to show off the gldsource engine in this game it shows off the source engine.

Chapter 2: Anomalous Materials: Setup for the rest of the game, the best part is ruining the casserole.

Chapter 3: Unforeseen Consequences: Alien horror simulator 1998 remastered.

Chapter 4: Office Complex: Cs_Office aliens vs one scientist with a crowbar.

Chapter 5: We've got Hostiles: Very helpful rescue team, got shot 20 times, would recommend.

Chapter 6: Blast Pit: (Insert extreme tentacle porn here)

Chapter 7: Power Up: Spend 20 minutes risking your life to hit a power switch to fry an alien.

Chapter 8: On a Rail: [strike]Rail[/strike] walking simulator 1998 remastered.

Chapter 9: Apprehension: An aquarium, a giant fish, a crossbow, a giant freezer and a black ops team in one place for some reason.

Chapter 10: Residue Processing: Coveyor belt maze is not fun.

Chapter 11: Qestionable Ethics: A room where two people are testing an alien weapon is sealed off by boxes for dramatic effect.

Chapter 12: Surface Tension: Basically an hour long action scene and a RPG is found on the side of a cliff.

Chapter 13: Forget About Freeman: Alien Slaughterhouse GOTY Edition.

Chapter 14: Lambda Core: 50% annoying puzzles 50% annoying enemies.

Chapter 15: Zen: Outer space plaforming without a spacesuit, my favourite.

Chapter 16: Gonarch's Lair: First boss of the game, better late than never I guess.

Chapter 17: Interloper: Am I in some kind of alien sweatshop?

Chapter 18: Nihilanth: Second and last boss of the game, even though more time is spent teleporting and plaforming.

Chapter 19: End game: I spent way too much time on this review 10/10[/spoiler]
I love my job.

《半条命》算是V社的经典之作了。个人是从《半条命2》开始接触这款游戏的，但一直想要体验一下一代的剧情，看看整个故事是如何发展的。本作采用了和二代一样的起源引擎重制，画面上有了较大改观，但剧情没有任何改变，作为一个剧情党能玩到九几年的老游戏，同时还有着不错的画面，已经很感动了。可以说《半条命》在当时定义了FPS类游戏的新潮流，这是任何游戏都无法代替的。但是对比《Black Mesa》来看，后者的画面绝对要好一些，画面党可以入那款。不管怎么说，《半条命》是我心目中的神作，值得入正收藏。

The only good thing this brings in - is physics(in terms of dead bodies and their moving limbs) and water textures. Get this only for collection, or if your PC runs OpenGL so badly it can't manage HL1 (I can't really imagine this). If you want to actually play HL1, play HL1 or Black Mesa.

By the way, Half-Life Deathmatch: Source is standalone multiplayer mod. And HLDM:S is buggy.

As a matter of fact, I do love Half-Life. This engine port is just not as good as it should've been, and that's the initial thought behind the Black Mesa project as far as I know.

Analisis Half Life OriginaL:
El juego consta de 18 Capitulos, Mas el nivel de introduccion (que te enseña a jugar) y el Epilogo, Lo que serian 20 Niveles por asi decirlo.

El juego toma alrededor de 8 a 11 horas ganarlo por primera ves, a mi me llevo aproximadamente 10 siendo que nunca lo habia jugado.

Los graficos fueron tan originales para su epoca, que a pesar de que son "obsoletos" tecnologicamente hablando, No pasaron de moda, De mas esta decir, Que half life, dios vida a toda una generacion de Juegos de valve Increibles, con mapas, mods, campañas, y un casi infinito ETC que ofrece diversion de todo tipo y para toda la gente.

Si bien, los juegos mas viejos han muerto en su mayor parte, todavia se puede ver pequeños remanentes de gente jugando, A excepcion del Counter 1.6 que tiene una comunidad gigante.

Este juego tiene 2 Facetas, la multiplayer que como estoy comentando, No pasa sus mejores dias (aunque hay mucho contenido, pocos servidores y gente lo juegan, ademas que ya no es tan accesible como en el pasado, pero hay algunas paginas donde encontrar cientos de mapas, skins y personalizaciones, mods, etc). Me gustaria encontrar mas pero no se mucho al respecto, aunque se que debe haberlos.

y La faceta Modo historia, Simplemente Excelente, Muy bien trabajada, los detalles cuidados, original, Atrapante, la musica bastante original aunque no se hace mucho uso de ella y hay muy poca (quizas el punto mas debil del juego y mas desaprovechado).

La musica la podes descargar gratis como DLC y el juego cuesta 7,49$ dolares, Yo recomiendo que no lo compre suelto, Sino que compre el pack de juegos de valve, ya que sin descuento vale casi 73$ dolares, lo cual es una ganga, al lado de juegos que valen 60$ dolares o mas y solo tienen 8 o 10 horas de contenido para jugar, por 73 Dolares usted tiene todos los juegos de valve y facil unas 100 a 200 horas de contenido garantizado, sin contar multiplayer y rejugabilidad.

半条命1玩通了，发现之前买的V社大包还有个半条命1起源，评论里挺多差评，我想应该不至于，4个多G下来，我还没玩到推手推车就放弃了，贴图完全跟原版一样，换了个引擎也没一点卵用，最重要的是载入点真（）多，开头坐电车载入3，4次，快下车时候警卫帮你开车门又载入一次，下车以后警卫帮你打开大铁门，又载入一次。。。。。。。。。而且载入时间死长，差不多是半条命2载入时间的3倍。
说这么多废话，结论是要么去玩黑山起源，要么去玩半条命1原版，永远别碰这玩意儿。

Half-Life: Source is a lazy port of the original game to the new engine, without using its full potential. There're a lot of bugs that were absent in the original Half-Life, some of them can be funny (levitating scientists in the game's prologue), but I stopped laughing after I encountered game breaking glitches (most of them were scripts that didn't want to trigger). HL: Source also lacks official expansions, Opposing Force and Blue Shift, and the modding community for this game is practically non-existant.

The only positives of this version that I can think of are improved lighting, water effects and the skybox in Surface Tension that was replaced by the area actually made in the games engine. Some of the weapons finally use animations cut from the game but left in the files, tho I'm not sure if this was done intentionally.

Overall I wouldn't recommend this game over it's vanilla counterpart. If you want to revisit Half-Life with newer graphics you better spend your money on Black Mesa.

This game makes me scream with how awesome it is. I love the story, the gameplay and everything about it! This game has strangely gave me a sense of optimism...Think of it like this. Wether you're a scientist in a bright orange ♥♥♥ suit smashing Crowbars into the faces of Alien Monsters. Climbing slowly out of the hell of a hidden government facility. To a poor secuity guard blowing holes in military cover up soldiers trying to kill him when all he wants to do to is live a comfortable life. Or perhaps a Military Cover up agent stepping into something you have no idea off and fighting a new war you've never trained for. This game makes you feel like a badass and makes you feel like you actually get some where. I IMPLORE YOU to buy these games. Nothing but good things to say about these games.

For me, this game is not a great port of Half-Life to Source.

Sadly I can't recommend this. Maybe for 2 €, but not for 10.
HL is a timeless masterpiece, you can play it over and over and never be bored (same for HL 2, that is even better than the first one imo).
But this "upgraded" port is nothing but a glitched version of HL 1. If you are new to the HL universe, go buy the original game, together with Blue Shift and Opposing Force.
If you want to see a REAL upgraded port of this game, go play Black Mesa. It's visually stunning and adds a few things to the original game.
